testcase.classname: F01_register| guest user could create new account
testcase.name: user create new account using valid user name and email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user selects gender type...............................................passed And user enters "automation" & "tester".....................................passed And user selects date of birth..............................................passed And user enters email.......................................................passed And users enters passowrd "p@sswOrd" and confirms it........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "p@sswOrd"..............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "p@sswOrd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
